page.title: 15Flash Play Group
page.content: At the play group there are usually 3 people running the play group. There are 10 children aged 3 and over and 5 children under 3. The play Group has run for 4 years. At half time they have a biscuit and a drink of orange, then, when the children have finished their drink, they choose what to do. The children have a choice what to do. The choice is to do a jigsaw or ride on the cars or to play on the climbing frame. After doing the jigsaws and riding on the cars they have a story and after the story the children's mums come and collect the children from play group and they go home .
